alert.note: Alert for Jackson Hole; Star Valley; Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 2:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Lincoln and southwestern Teton Counties through 230 PM MDT... At 200 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles northeast of Felt to near Alta to near Teton Pass to near Palisades Reservoir. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Wilson around 210 PM MDT. Jackson, Rafter J Ranch, Grand Teton and Rendezvous Peak around 215 PM MDT. Teton Village around 220 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Leigh Lake, Moran Bay, Moose, Hoback, Kelly and Colter Bay Village. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Jackson Hole; Star Valley; Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains
